testcase.name: Verify user is able to checkout or not - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed And the page title is "Home Page"...........................................passed And User clicks on the header sign-in link..................................passed And "Customer Login" page is displayed......................................passed When User enters the email address "Test121@yopmail.com" and password "Test12345".passed And User clicks on the sign-in button.......................................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed When User clicks on shop new yoga button....................................passed Then the "New Luma Yoga Collection" page is displayed.......................passed And Click on the required Gwen Drawstring Bike Short........................passed And the required Gwen Drawstring Bike Short page is displayed...............passed And Select 29 and Orange....................................................passed And Click on Add to card button.............................................passed Then button text changes to Added...........................................passed And User should scroll to the top...........................................passed And Click on cart...........................................................passed And Click on proceed to checkout button.....................................passed Then checkout page is displayed.............................................passed And Click on add new address................................................passed And the shipping address pop-up appears.....................................passed And user fills in all the parameters Teknotrait solutions Pvt. Ltd,Linwood Boulevard Kansas City Missouri),Missouri,Victoria,12345,Australia and 9732123456.passed And Click on ship here......................................................passed When Clicked on next button.................................................passed Then "Payment Method" page is getting displayed.............................passed And click on place order....................................................passed And "Thank you for your purchase!" screen should be displayed with the order number.passed
